questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is an expert sniper known for his long nose and dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
